title: Total Commander Ultima Prime v3.8 + reg
description:
Newest version - TC UP 3.8

Total Commander Ultima Prime is a collection of the software and customized settings sets gathered in one installation package for enhancing Total Commander (file manager) possibilities.

This project differs from official distribution provided by Christian Ghisler on www.totalcmd.com site.

If you?d like to see and try this solution, you can download it now.   

In the newest version it is provided additional predefined "For commercial use" installation mode for the users who would like to use our project in commercial environment.

Every application with licence restricted for personal use only will be deselected from installation.

TC UP has been extended by another great tool called Docx2Rtf which allows to view and convert different documents fromats (i.e. Word 2007 files).

According to users requirements we have added HFS - HTTP file server application.

TC UP can now handle opening external storage devices (CD/DVD discs, memory cards, etc.) by its own.

Various plugins has been updated to the newest versions.

MSIE Cache Browser filesystem plugin has been included, which give the possibility to manage Internet Explorer&#039;s internal cache.

The core of our project - Total Commander has been updated to the recent release (7.03).

Some other applications (Artweaver 0.5.1, IcoFx 1.6, InfraRecorder 0.45.0.0, Opera@USB 9.27, System Info for Windows Build 2008-04-02, WinMerge 2.8.0.0) has been upgraded also.

All reported and known bugs has been corrected.

2008-05-05 , added by: ULTIMA PRIMA
